roleset.name: draw/write untidily
roleset.note: SCRIBBLE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls scribble-25.2. Checked by Julia, 11/2010. (from scribble.01-v)

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: He-1 sipped tea sweetened with honey from his high-backed leather chair at his bench, while *trace*-1 scribbling notes ordering spectators to stop whispering or to take off their hats in his courtroom.
example.arg: notes ordering spectators to stop whispering or to take off their hats in his courtroom

example.name: What kind of game is she playing?! with arg2
example.text: I scribbled him a note saying I didn?t know any of the Trivial Pursuit answers but I knew one thing-- that he was hot!
example.arg: a note saying I didn't know any of the Trivial Pursuit answers but I knew one thing-- that he was hot!
